t= int (raw_input())
i=0
j=0
a=[]
tp=1
n=0
m=0
while t:
    m=0
    t-=1
    n=int (raw_input())
    a=raw_input().split(" ")
    for i in range(len(a)):
        a[i]=int(a[i])
    while True:
        m+=1
        tp=1
        for i in range(len(a)):
            if a[i]>=i+1:
                a[i]=a[i]-i-1
                tp=0
                break
        if tp==1:
            break
    if m%2==0:
        print("ALICE")
    else:
        print('BOB')
